name: CancelBooking
description:
Cancel an existing booking.

Call this tool to cancel a booking using its unique ID. Requires specific OAuth permissions depending on user level. For seller-level cancellations, an Appointments Plus or Premium subscription is necessary.

parameters.name: booking_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the booking to be canceled. This ID is required to identify which booking to cancel.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [Booking](entity:Booking) object representing the to-be-cancelled booking.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: Unique key to ensure the request is idempotent and prevents duplicate operations.

value_schema.description: A unique key to make this request an idempotent operation.

parameters.name: booking_revision_number
parameters.description: The current revision number of the booking for optimistic concurrency control.

value_schema.description: The revision number for the booking used for optimistic concurrency.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: booking_id
parameters.description: The ID of the [Booking](entity:Booking) object representing the to-be-cancelled booking.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [Booking](entity:Booking) object representing the to-be-cancelled booking.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique key to make this request an idempotent operation.

value_schema.description: A unique key to make this request an idempotent operation.

parameters.name: booking_version
parameters.description: The revision number for the booking used for optimistic concurrency.

value_schema.description: The revision number for the booking used for optimistic concurrency.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
